title: World trade, Asian commodities and silver

content.question: Which of the following best characterizes world trade in the period 1450 to 1750 ?

choices.label: Commodities from Africa dominated trade with China and India.
The demand for Asian commodities was financed by New World silver.
International conflict declined because of growing cooperation among international traders.

content.answer: The demand for Asian commodities was financed by New World silver.

skill.text: Skill 4.A: Identify and describe a historical context for a specific historical development or process.
